data.event: Cleveland was founded in 1857 as the seat of newly formed White County.

event.title: was incorporated as a town in 1870

data.event: Cleveland was incorporated as a town in 1870 and as a city in 1949.

event.title: is named for General Benjamin Cleveland, a War of 1812

data.event: The community is named for General Benjamin Cleveland, a War of 1812 figure and grandson of Colonel Benjamin Cleveland, a Revolutionary War figure.
